features: Provides 12-hour protection against germs even after eating and drinking
body.description: Colgate Total mouthwash doesn't just freshen breath, it provides 12-hour protection against germs even after eating and drinking, helping to keep your mouth healthy and fresh. Colgate Total Advanced Pro-Shield Mouthwash kills 99 percent of germs on contact, significantly reduces plaque and helps prevent the gum disease gingivitis. This antibacterial mouthwash formula is alcohol-free (does not contain ethanol) and has a refreshing Peppermint Blast flavor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Colgate Total 12HR Protection Mouthwash Colgate Total 12HR Protection Mouthwash provides 12-hour protection against germs, even after eating and drinking. The alcohol-free mouthwash formula doesn’t burn and keeps on working after brushing. For great results, use with Colgate Total Toothpaste.

Colgate Total 12HR Protection Colgate Total Gum Health Colgate Optic White Colgate Enamel Health Colgate Peroxyl Product Colgate Total Peppermint/Colgate Total Spearmint Mouthwash Colgate Total Gum Health Mouthwash Colgate Optic White Advanced Whitening Mouthwash Colgate Enamel Health Mouthwash Colgate Peroxyl Mouthwash Benefit 12HR protection against germs, even after eating and drinking. Clinically proven to help reverse gingivitis in 6 weeks- Fights plaque bacteria between teeth along the gum line. Actively whitens and seals out new stains by removing surface stains and helps to prevent new stains between brushing. Strengthens enamel even where brush may miss. Helps replenish natural calcium back into enamel. Cleans and promotes healing on minor oral wounds. Helps promote healing of mouth sores, irritations and mouth burns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use it everyday
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like the typical mouthwash taste (you know the brand, starts with an “L”). I bought this just to try it out, and I really like it. I swish it around for a bit after brushing and flossing, and then swish some water around several times. It leaves my mouth with a very clean taste and feeling, almost like a chlorine for your mouth lol. Highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Evita bacterias y mal olor en tu boca

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best mouthwash that works for me.
reviews.reviewText: Works better than the Crest equivalent even tho they have the same active ingredient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The flavor reminds me of the old days when I used to use their toothpaste. Put some in my mouth and instantly remembered that old Colgate taste. I bought this because it said "Peppermint" and I thought that'd be a nice try from all the typical mint flavors you see. But I didn't know it was straight up gonna taste just like their toothpaste. lolThe flavor kinda gets old after a while, because it just tastes like you liquified a peppermint candy cane and put some drops of it in the mouthwash. lol But it only burns a tiny bit when you're swishing it around. After use, I do feel like my mouth is refreshed and cleaner. However, I can't help but feel like it just isn't doing a good enough job. You can tell it has lasting effects to help ward off funk on your teeth, but it's just a bit lackluster. I'm still going to finish it all, and it works just fine. Definitely a good value for price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Has a nice strong flavor which keeps me fresh !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazon is the only place I found this mouthwash. It tastes good and my teeth feel clean after I use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash works great and leaves my mouth feeling very fresh! I ordered to use it while my piercing is healing and was told to use an alcohol-free mouthwash during this time. This is a wonderful option and I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This mouthwash is AWESOME!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this Colgate Total mouthwash 12 hour protection for a few months now. What I love most about it is how it cleans out the gunk between my teeth that the toothbrush cannot. It seems to have a slippery element to it that surrounds gunk between teeth and flushes it out. Regular mouthwash doesn’t do that, at least not for me. I have a very difficult time flossing as my molars are so tightly packed, so this mouthwash makes a HUGE difference! It’s shocking how much gunk is still left between teeth after brushing alone. This mouthwash really works well! No, I was not paid for this review, I just LOVE this stuff. The flavor is a cool minty fresh, and doesn’t burn my mouth like those with alcohol in them. The price is great as well!
